get.description: A chassis is an enclosure that contains multiple blade servers. This API applies only to products with that hardware configuration.

parameters.name: listDetailed
parameters.description:
When set to true, a hardwareReportResponse will be included for each chassis.
If hardwareReportResponse.status equals SUCCESS, a detailed hardwareReport for the chassis will also be included.
If hardwareReportResponse.status equals ERROR, then hardwareReportResponse.error will contain a reason.
hardwareReportResponse.status will equal INITIALIZING for a brief period after system startup.

post.summary: Add a chassis to be monitored
post.description: A chassis is an enclosure that contains multiple blade servers. This API applies only to products with that hardware configuration.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The ChassisModel object to be added. Required properties are the name and uuid of the chassis, and the hostname and bay number of at least one blade if this chassis resource is being created for the first time. Blades may be added or removed from monitoring in an existing chassis by using PUT /chassis/{chassisName}.
